TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ComboBox/ObjectCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ComboBox.ObjectCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 中项的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of items in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类封装中的项 。The class encapsulates the items in the . 组合框的对象集合可用于管理许多类型的对象，包括字符串、图像和自定义业务对象。The object collection of a combo box can be used to manage many types of objects, including strings, images, and custom business objects. 可以通过多种方式将项添加到集合中。You can add items to the collection in several ways. 方法将一个对象添加到集合中。The method adds one object to the collection. 若要将多个对象添加到集合中，最好创建一个项的数组，并使用方法进行赋值 。To add a number of objects to the collection, it is best to create an array of items and assign with the method. 若要在集合中的特定位置插入对象，可以使用 方法。To insert an object at a specific location within the collection, you can use the method. 若要删除集合中已知索引处的项，可以使用 方法或 方法。To remove items at a known index in the collection you can use either the method or the method. 方法从集合中移除所有项。The method removes all the items from the collection. 除了用于添加和删除项的方法和属性外， 还提供用于在集合中查找项的方法。In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing items, the also provides methods to find items within the collection. 使用 方法可以确定对象是否为集合的成员。The method enables you to determine if an object is a member of the collection. 知道项位于集合内后，可以使用 方法来确定项在集合中的位置。Once you know that the item is located within the collection, you can use the method to determine where the item is located within the collection.

span.span: Adds an item to the list of items for a .

span.span: The zero-based index of the item in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将项添加到组合框。This method adds an item to the combo box. 如果将 的属性 设置为，则 `true` 该项将按字母顺序插入列表中。If the property of the is set to `true`, the item is inserted into the list alphabetically. 否则，项将插入到列表的末尾。Otherwise, the item is inserted at the end of the list. 项的可视化表示形式显示在组合框中。A visual representation of the item is displayed in the combo box. 此内容表示形式由属性指定 。This content representation is specified by the property. 如果 属性为 `null` ，则调用项的 `ToString` 方法以获取组合框中显示的字符串; 否则，将显示由属性指定的存储对象的属性 。If the property is `null`, the item's `ToString` method is called to obtain the string that is displayed in the combo box; otherwise, the property of the stored object as specified by the property is displayed. 如果没有足够的可用空间来存储新项，则会发生。A occurs if there is insufficient space available to store the new item. 若要将一组项添加到组合框中，最好是使用 方法。To add a set of items to the combo box it is best to use the method. 如果选择使用 方法将多个项添加到组合框中，请使用 方法在添加时挂起重新绘制，并使用 方法恢复重画。If you choose to use the method to add a number of items to the combo box, use the method to suspend repainting during your add and the method to resume repainting. 您可以使用 方法指定列表中添加项的位置。You can use the method to specify the location in the list where an item is added. 将对象添加到集合时，将 调用对象的 方法以获取要在列表中显示的字符串。When an object is added to the collection, the calls the object's method to obtain the string to display in the list.

summary.span: 向 的项列表添加项的数组。

span.span: Adds an array of items to the list of items for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 的属性 设置为 true，则会按字母顺序将项插入列表中。If the property of the is set to true, the items are inserted into the list alphabetically. 否则，项将按照它们在数组中出现的顺序插入。Otherwise, the items are inserted in the order they occur within the array. 此方法通常传递对象的数组 ，但任何类型的对象的数组都可以传递给此方法。This method is typically passed an array of objects, but an array of any type of object can be passed to this method. 将对象添加到集合时，方法将调用对象的 方法以获取要在列表中显示的字符串。When an object is added to the collection, the method calls the object's method to obtain the string to display in the list. 使用此方法将项添加到集合时，无需调用 和 方法来优化性能。When using this method to add items to the collection, you do not need to call the and methods to optimize performance. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 通过设置 text 属性并使用方法填充来初始化控件 。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a control by setting the text property and using the method to populate the . 它还演示如何处理 事件。It also demonstrates handling the event. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并 `InitializeComboBox` 从窗体的构造函数或方法中调用方法 `Load` 。To run the example, paste the following code in a form and call the `InitializeComboBox` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxDropDown#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxDropDown/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxDropDown#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxDropDown/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxDropDown#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxDropDown/VB/form1.vb#2)]
